org.judal.storage.table

Interface RecordSet<R extends Record>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<R>, Iterable<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayListRecordSet

    public interface RecordSet<R extends Record>
extends Collection<R>

    Interface for in-memory collections of records read from the data source.

    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a Record to the end of this RecordSet.

      Return a list of all the Record elements for which the given Predicate evaluates to true.

      Find the first row which value at columnName is equal to the given value

      Return the Record in a given position.
